room_title: Escape room "Secret Vault" by Race 2 Xcape in Springfield (MO)
review: We had such a fun time trying to escape The Vault. Definitely will be back again.

room_title: Escape room "Secret Vault" by Race 2 Xcape in Springfield (MO)
review: I have found my new hobby! And a great place to indulge it! The Secret Vault was a clever and confounding room with a great story behind it. My friends and I had a wonderful time piecing together all the clues.We were so close too...

room_title: Escape room "Secret Vault" by Race 2 Xcape in Springfield (MO)
review: Going to the Secret Vault was my first "escape room" experience and I LOVED IT! We had so much fun and cannot wait to go back. Thanks Race 2 Xcape!
